channel.title: attack.t1041 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1041 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: DNSCat2 Powershell Implementation Detection Via Process Creation
item.description: The PowerShell implementation of DNSCat2 calls nslookup to craft queries. Counting nslookup processes spawned by PowerShell will show hundreds or thousands of instances if PS DNSCat2 is active locally.

item.title: Exfiltration and Tunneling Tools Execution
item.description: Execution of well known tools for data exfiltration and tunneling
